1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Text table
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Text.TextTable
6  ( -- * Position of contents
7    Position (..),
8    textPos,
9  
10    -- * Constructing cells
11    Cell (..),
12  
13    textTable,
14    textTableWithHead,
15    textCell,
16    textRuleCell,
17    textBlockCell,
18    textBlockCellPlus,
19  
20    -- * Rendering tables
21    alignTable,
22    renderTable,
23  ) where
24
25import qualified Data.Char                      as C
26import qualified Data.List                      as L
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.List      as B
28import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude   as B
29
30
31-- ---------------------------------  Position
32
33data Position
34    = Front | Middle | Rear
35      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
36
37type Measure a = [a] -> Int
38
39textPos :: String -> [Position]
40textPos = map p where
41    p c | c `elem` "<^" = Front
42        | c `elem` ">v" = Rear
43        | otherwise     = Middle
44
45position :: Measure a -> a -> Position -> Int -> [a] -> [a]
46position measure x pos size xs = p pos where
47    p Front  =         xs ++ pad
48    p Middle = left ++ xs ++ right
49    p Rear   = pad  ++ xs
50
51    pad      = padding measure x size xs
52    (l, r)   = divideBy2 $ paddingSize measure size xs
53    left     = replicate l x
54    right    = replicate r x
55
56padding :: Measure a -> a -> Int -> [a] -> [a]
57padding measure x size xs = replicate n x where
58    n = paddingSize measure size xs
59
60paddingSize :: Measure a -> Int -> [a] -> Int
61paddingSize measure size xs = max 0 $ size - measure xs
62
63divideBy2 :: Int -> (Int, Int)
64divideBy2 x
65    | x `rem` 2 == 0  = (y, y)
66    | otherwise       = (y, y + 1)
67    where y = x `div` 2
68
69
70-- ---------------------------------  Cell
71
72data Cell = Cell {
73      cellText   :: [String]
74    , cellWidth  :: Int
75    , cellHeight :: Int
76    , cellPos    :: Position
77    , cellPad    :: Char
78    } deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
79
80emptyCell :: Cell
81emptyCell = Cell [] 0 0 Front ' '
82
83-- constructor / text to cell
84
85textTable :: [Position] -> [[String]] -> [[Cell]]
86textTable ps = map (textRow ps)
87
88textTableWithHead :: [Position] -> Char -> [String] -> [[String]] -> [[Cell]]
89textTableWithHead ps pad label body = h ++ r ++ b where
90    h = textTable ps [label]
91    r = [replicate (length label) $ textRuleCell pad]
92    b = textTable ps body
93
94textRow :: [Position] -> [String] -> [Cell]
95textRow ps xs = map f $ zip ps xs where
96    f (pos, text) = textCell pos text
97
98textCell :: Position -> String -> Cell
99textCell pos s =
100    Cell { cellText   = [s]
101         , cellWidth  = displaySize s
102         , cellHeight = 1
103         , cellPos    = pos
104         , cellPad    = ' ' }
105
106textRuleCell :: Char -> Cell
107textRuleCell c = cell { cellPad = c } where
108    cell = textCell Front [c]
109
110textBlockCell :: Position -> [String] -> Cell
111textBlockCell = textBlockCellPlus 0
112
113textBlockCellPlus :: Int -> Position -> [String] -> Cell
114textBlockCellPlus n pos xs =
115    Cell { cellText   = xs
116         , cellWidth  = maximum $ map displaySize xs
117         , cellHeight = n + length xs
118         , cellPos    = pos
119         , cellPad    = ' ' }
120
121
122-- ---------------------------------  Alignment
123
124-- alignment / cell to cell
125
126alignTable :: [[Cell]] -> [[Cell]]
127alignTable =
128    withTranspose (map alignWidth)
129     . map alignHeight
130     . transposable emptyCell
131
132alignWidth :: [Cell] -> [Cell]
133alignWidth cs = map rewidth cs where
134    rewidth c = c { cellWidth = maxWidth }
135    maxWidth  = maximum $ map cellWidth cs
136
137alignHeight :: [Cell] -> [Cell]
138alignHeight cs = map reheight cs where
139    reheight c = c { cellHeight = maxHeight }
140    maxHeight  = maximum $ map cellHeight cs
141
142-- render / cell to text
143
144renderTable :: String -> [[Cell]] -> [String]
145renderTable vrule = concatMap (renderRow vrule)
146
147renderRow :: String -> [Cell] -> [String]
148renderRow vrule =
149    map (L.intercalate vrule)
150     . L.transpose
151     . B.mapWithLast renderCell (renderCell . unpad)
152
153renderCell :: Cell -> [String]
154renderCell (Cell texts wd ht pos pad) = map width $ height texts where
155    width  = position displaySize pad pos wd
156    height = position length "" Front ht
157
158unpad :: B.Map Cell
159unpad cell
160    | cellPad cell == ' ' = cell { cellWidth = 0 }
161    | otherwise           = cell
162
163
164-- ---------------------------------  Utility
165
166withTranspose :: ([[a]] -> [[b]]) -> [[a]] -> [[b]]
167withTranspose f = L.transpose . f . L.transpose
168
169transposable :: a -> [[a]] -> [[a]]
170transposable pad tab = map p tab where
171    p = position length pad Front n
172    n = maximum $ map length tab
173
174displaySize :: Measure Char
175displaySize = sum . map displaySizeChar      
176
177displaySizeChar :: Char -> Int
178displaySizeChar c
179    | n < 4096  = 1
180    | otherwise = 2
181    where n = C.ord c
182
